com.percussion.services.publisher
Interface IPSSiteItem

public interface IPSSiteItem

A site item represents the state of a single published item to a site. Site items as shown by this interface are actually composites of PSSiteItem and PSPubItem. These are joined on the reference id. However, updates to PSSiteItem must take into account that new records from PSPubItem must be joined as updates occur.

Author:
dougrand

Nested Class Summary
static class IPSSiteItem.Operation
          The operation that was performed on the item
static class IPSSiteItem.Status
          The status of the operation, note that the order here must match the above order for operation so that the value for publish and success match, and unpublish and failure match.
